sqlMap.select:
/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > selectCOM_CD_DTL_LIST */
SELECT com_cd, CD_VAL, CD_NM FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL WHERE delt_flg = 'N' and use_flg = 'Y'
AND com_cd = #PARAM1#
ORDER By SRT_SEQ

/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > searchWarehouseRSQL */ SELECT WH_CD, WH_NM, WH_ALS_NM, WH_ADDR, WH_CTY_NM, WH_STE_CD, WH_ZIP_CD, WH_PHN_NO, WH_FAX_NO, WH_RMK, USE_FLG FROM WHM_WH WHERE 1=1 AND WH_CD = UPPER(#wh_cd#)

/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > searchContactPersonRSQL */ SELECT CNTC_PSON_SEQ, CNTC_PSON_NM, CNTC_PSON_EML_ADDR, CNTC_PSON_PHN_NO, CNTC_PSON_FAX_NO, CNTC_PSON_RMK, RCV_EML_FLG, REP_FLG FROM WHM_CNTC_PSON WHERE 1=1 AND WH_CD = UPPER(#wh_cd#) AND ISNULL(DELT_FLG,'N') = 'N'
/** WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > getMaxLocIdRSQL*/ SELECT 'LC' + right(replicate('0',3) + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),ISNULL(MAX(SUBSTRING (LOC_ID,3,4)),0)+1),4) FROM WHM_LOC WHERE LOC_ID LIKE 'LC%'

/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > searchLocationRSQL */ SELECT LOC_ID, LOC_CD, ISNULL(LOC_LINE_NO,0) AS LOC_LINE_NO, ISNULL(LOC_ROW_NO,0) AS LOC_ROW_NO, ISNULL(LOC_FLR_NO,0) AS LOC_FLR_NO, LOC_TP_CD, LOC_SPC_TP_CD, ISNULL(LOC_MAX_VOL,0) AS LOC_MAX_VOL, ISNULL(LOC_MAX_VOL_CFT,0) AS LOC_MAX_VOL_FT, ISNULL(LOC_MAX_WGT,0) AS LOC_MAX_WGT, ISNULL(LOC_MAX_WGT_LBS,0) AS LOC_MAX_LBS, USE_FLG, LOC_RMK FROM WHM_LOC WHERE 1=1 AND WH_CD = #wh_cd# AND LOC_CD NOT IN ('DUMMY')
sqlMap.insert: /* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveWarehouseCSQL */ INSERT INTO WHM_WH ( WH_CD, WH_NM, WH_ALS_NM, WH_ADDR, WH_CTY_NM, WH_STE_CD, WH_ZIP_CD, WH_PHN_NO, WH_FAX_NO, WH_RMK, USE_FLG, CRE_DT, CRE_USR_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_ID ) VALUES ( UPPER(#wh_cd#), UPPER(#wh_nm#), UPPER(#wh_als_nm#), #wh_addr#, #wh_cty_nm#, UPPER(#wh_ste_cd#), #wh_zip_cd#, #wh_phn_no#, #wh_fax_no#, #wh_rmk#, #use_flg#, GETDATE(), #cre_usr_id#, GETDATE(), #upd_usr_id# )

/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveContactPersonCSQL */ INSERT INTO WHM_CNTC_PSON ( WH_CD, CNTC_PSON_SEQ, CNTC_PSON_NM, CNTC_PSON_EML_ADDR, CNTC_PSON_PHN_NO, CNTC_PSON_FAX_NO, CNTC_PSON_RMK, RCV_EML_FLG, REP_FLG, DELT_FLG, CRE_DT, CRE_USR_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_ID ) VALUES ( UPPER(#wh_cd#), (SELECT isnull(max(CNTC_PSON_SEQ),0)+1 from WHM_CNTC_PSON where WH_CD = UPPER(#wh_cd#)), #cntc_pson_nm#, #cntc_pson_eml_addr#, #cntc_pson_phn_no#, #cntc_pson_fax_no#, #cntc_pson_rmk#, #rcv_eml_flg#, #rep_flg#, #delt_flg#, GETDATE(), #cre_usr_id#, GETDATE(), #upd_usr_id# )
sqlMap.select:
/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > CheckLocationCode */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WHM_LOC WHERE WH_CD=#wh_cd# AND LOC_CD=#loc_cd#
AND LOC_ID not in (#loc_id#)

/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > CheckLocationInUse */ SELECT( ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WHM_ITM_INVT WHERE LOC_ID = #loc_id# ) + ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WHM_RCV_SHP_ITM
WHERE ITM_LOC_ID = #loc_id# ) ) as RES

/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > CheckLineRowFloor */ select count(*) from WHM_LOC where wh_cd = #wh_cd# and LOC_LINE_NO = #loc_line_no# and LOC_ROW_NO = #loc_row_no# and LOC_FLR_NO = #loc_flr_no#
and LOC_ID not in ( #loc_id# )
sqlMap.insert: /* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveLocationCSQL */ INSERT INTO WHM_LOC ( WH_CD, LOC_ID, LOC_CD, LOC_LINE_NO, LOC_ROW_NO, LOC_FLR_NO, LOC_TP_CD, LOC_SPC_TP_CD, LOC_MAX_VOL, LOC_MAX_VOL_CFT, LOC_MAX_WGT, LOC_MAX_WGT_LBS, USE_FLG, LOC_RMK, CRE_DT, CRE_USR_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_ID ) VALUES ( UPPER(#wh_cd#), #loc_id#, #loc_cd#, #loc_line_no#, #loc_row_no#, #loc_flr_no#, #loc_tp_cd#, #loc_spc_tp_cd#, #loc_max_vol#, #loc_max_vol_ft#, #loc_max_wgt#, #loc_max_lbs#, #use_flg#, #loc_rmk#, GETDATE(), #cre_usr_id#, GETDATE(), #upd_usr_id# )
sqlMap.update: /* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveWarehouseUSQL */ UPDATE WHM_WH SET WH_NM = UPPER(#wh_nm#), WH_ALS_NM = UPPER(#wh_als_nm#), WH_ADDR = #wh_addr#, WH_CTY_NM = #wh_cty_nm#, WH_STE_CD = UPPER(#wh_ste_cd#), WH_ZIP_CD = #wh_zip_cd#, WH_PHN_NO = #wh_phn_no#, WH_FAX_NO = #wh_fax_no#, WH_RMK = #wh_rmk#, USE_FLG = #use_flg#, UPD_DT = GETDATE(), UPD_USR_ID = #upd_usr_id# WHERE WH_CD = #wh_cd#

/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveContactPersonUSQL */ UPDATE WHM_CNTC_PSON SET CNTC_PSON_NM = #cntc_pson_nm#, CNTC_PSON_EML_ADDR = #cntc_pson_eml_addr#, CNTC_PSON_PHN_NO = #cntc_pson_phn_no#, CNTC_PSON_FAX_NO = #cntc_pson_fax_no#, CNTC_PSON_RMK = #cntc_pson_rmk#, RCV_EML_FLG = #rcv_eml_flg#, REP_FLG = #rep_flg#, DELT_FLG = #delt_flg#, UPD_DT = GETDATE(), UPD_USR_ID = #upd_usr_id# WHERE CNTC_PSON_SEQ = #cntc_pson_seq# AND WH_CD = #wh_cd#

/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveLocationUSQL */ UPDATE WHM_LOC SET LOC_CD =#loc_cd#, LOC_LINE_NO =#loc_line_no#, LOC_ROW_NO =#loc_row_no#, LOC_FLR_NO =#loc_flr_no#, LOC_TP_CD =#loc_tp_cd#, LOC_SPC_TP_CD =#loc_spc_tp_cd#, LOC_MAX_VOL =#loc_max_vol#, LOC_MAX_VOL_CFT =#loc_max_vol_ft#, LOC_MAX_WGT =#loc_max_wgt#, LOC_MAX_WGT_LBS =#loc_max_lbs#, USE_FLG =#use_flg#, LOC_RMK =#loc_rmk#, UPD_DT = GETDATE(), UPD_USR_ID = #upd_usr_id# WHERE LOC_ID = #loc_id#
/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveLocationDSQL */ DELETE FROM WHM_LOC WHERE LOC_ID = #loc_id#
/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveContactPersonDSQL */ UPDATE WHM_CNTC_PSON SET DELT_FLG = 'Y' WHERE CNTC_PSON_SEQ = #cntc_pson_seq# AND WH_CD = #wh_cd#
sqlMap.select: /* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > searchWarehouseRSQL1 */ SELECT WH_CD, WH_NM, WH_ALS_NM, WH_ADDR, WH_CTY_NM, WH_STE_CD, WH_ZIP_CD, WH_PHN_NO, WH_FAX_NO, WH_RMK, USE_FLG FROM TL_WH WHERE 1=1 AND WH_CD = UPPER(#wh_cd#)

/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > searchContactPersonRSQL1 */ SELECT CNTC_PSON_SEQ, CNTC_PSON_NM, CNTC_PSON_EML_ADDR, CNTC_PSON_PHN_NO, CNTC_PSON_FAX_NO, CNTC_PSON_RMK, ISNULL(RCV_EML_FLG,'N') AS RCV_EML_FLG, ISNULL(REP_FLG,'N') AS REP_FLG FROM TL_WH_CNTC_PSON WHERE 1=1 AND WH_CD = UPPER(#wh_cd#) AND ISNULL(DELT_FLG,'N') = 'N'
sqlMap.insert: /* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveWarehouseCSQL1 */ INSERT INTO TL_WH ( WH_CD, WH_NM, WH_ALS_NM, WH_ADDR, WH_CTY_NM, WH_STE_CD, WH_ZIP_CD, WH_PHN_NO, WH_FAX_NO, WH_RMK, USE_FLG, CRE_DT, CRE_USR_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_ID ) VALUES ( UPPER(#wh_cd#), UPPER(#wh_nm#), UPPER(#wh_als_nm#), #wh_addr#, #wh_cty_nm#, UPPER(#wh_ste_cd#), #wh_zip_cd#, #wh_phn_no#, #wh_fax_no#, #wh_rmk#, #use_flg#, GETDATE(), #cre_usr_id#, GETDATE(), #upd_usr_id# )
sqlMap.update: /* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveWarehouseUSQL1 */ UPDATE TL_WH SET WH_NM = UPPER(#wh_nm#), WH_ALS_NM = UPPER(#wh_als_nm#), WH_ADDR = #wh_addr#, WH_CTY_NM = #wh_cty_nm#, WH_STE_CD = UPPER(#wh_ste_cd#), WH_ZIP_CD = #wh_zip_cd#, WH_PHN_NO = #wh_phn_no#, WH_FAX_NO = #wh_fax_no#, WH_RMK = #wh_rmk#, USE_FLG = #use_flg#, UPD_DT = GETDATE(), UPD_USR_ID = #upd_usr_id# WHERE WH_CD = #wh_cd#
sqlMap.insert: /* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveContactPersonCSQL1 */ INSERT INTO TL_WH_CNTC_PSON ( WH_CD, CNTC_PSON_SEQ, CNTC_PSON_NM, CNTC_PSON_EML_ADDR, CNTC_PSON_PHN_NO, CNTC_PSON_FAX_NO, CNTC_PSON_RMK, RCV_EML_FLG, REP_FLG, DELT_FLG, CRE_DT, CRE_USR_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USR_ID ) VALUES ( UPPER(#wh_cd#), (SELECT isnull(max(CNTC_PSON_SEQ),0)+1 from TL_WH_CNTC_PSON where WH_CD = UPPER(#wh_cd#)), #cntc_pson_nm#, #cntc_pson_eml_addr#, #cntc_pson_phn_no#, #cntc_pson_fax_no#, #cntc_pson_rmk#, #rcv_eml_flg#, #rep_flg#, #delt_flg#, GETDATE(), #cre_usr_id#, GETDATE(), #upd_usr_id# )
sqlMap.update: /* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveContactPersonUSQL */ UPDATE TL_WH_CNTC_PSON SET CNTC_PSON_NM = #cntc_pson_nm#, CNTC_PSON_EML_ADDR = #cntc_pson_eml_addr#, CNTC_PSON_PHN_NO = #cntc_pson_phn_no#, CNTC_PSON_FAX_NO = #cntc_pson_fax_no#, CNTC_PSON_RMK = #cntc_pson_rmk#, RCV_EML_FLG = #rcv_eml_flg#, REP_FLG = #rep_flg#, DELT_FLG = #delt_flg#, UPD_DT = GETDATE(), UPD_USR_ID = #upd_usr_id# WHERE CNTC_PSON_SEQ = #cntc_pson_seq# AND WH_CD = #wh_cd#
/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > saveContactPersonDSQL */ UPDATE TL_WH_CNTC_PSON SET DELT_FLG = 'Y' WHERE CNTC_PSON_SEQ = #cntc_pson_seq# AND WH_CD = #wh_cd#
sqlMap.insert: /* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > defaultQC_Location_Create */ INSERT INTO TL_WH_LOC ( LOC_CD, WH_LOC_CD, WH_LOC_NM, ZONE_CD, LOC_LINE, LOC_ROW, LOC_FLOOR, SPACE_TP_CD, PUT_TP_CD, PROP_CD, ABC_CD, MAX_CBM, MAX_KGS, WIDTH, LENGTH, HEIGHT, USE_FLG, RMK, RGST_ID, RGST_SYS_DT, MODI_ID, MODI_SYS_DT ) VALUES ( UPPER(#wh_cd#), 'QC010101', 'QC', 'QC', 1, 1, 1, 'N', 'N', 'NON', 'A', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 'Y', 'System Code', #upd_usr_id#, GETDATE(), #upd_usr_id#, GETDATE() )

/* WhmWarehouseEntrySQL.xml > defaultQC_Zone_Create */ INSERT INTO TL_WH_ZONE ( LOC_CD, ZONE_CD, SPACE_TP_CD, PUT_TP_CD, ABC_CD, USE_FLG, RMK, RGST_ID, RGST_SYS_DT, MODI_ID, MODO_SYS_DT ) VALUES ( UPPER(#wh_cd#), 'QC', 'N', 'N', 'A', 'Y', 'System Code', #upd_usr_id#, GETDATE(), #upd_usr_id#, GETDATE() )
